sys_rest_message_fn.content:
{ "name": "ts_ssh_${partner_name}", "type": "ssh", "protocol": "ssh", "transferType": "partner", "maxConcurrentConnection": 10, "default": false, "accessLevel": "BUSINESS_UNIT", "account": "${partner_name}",
"host": "${remotehost}", "port": "${remoteport}", "dmz": "none", "downloadFolderAdvancedExpressionEnabled": false, "downloadFolder": "${downloadpath}", "downloadPatternAdvancedExpressionEnabled": false, "downloadPatternType": "glob", "downloadPattern": "*", "uploadFolderOverridable": false, "uploadFolder": "${uploadpath}", "uploadPermissions": 644,
"transferMode": "AUTO_DETECT", "verifyFinger": false, "fipsMode": false, "userName": "${remoteuser}", "usePassword": true,
"password": "${remotepass}", "socketTimeout": 300, "socketBufferSize": 65536, "socketSendBufferSize": 65536, "bufferSize": 32768, "blockSize": 32768, "tcpNoDelay": true
}
